Here’s a quick summary of the Ndax Affiliate Program Terms:

  • To earn credit, your referral must use your link, complete account verification within 30 days, and deposit at least $100 CAD.
  • You can’t refer someone who already has an Ndax account, even under a different email.
  • Abuse of the program may result in loss of referral credit and removal from the program.
  • Ndax may change or cancel the program, tiers, or rewards at any time.
  • Everyone starts at the Avid tier by default, and tier upgrades depend on monthly referral volume.
  • If you notice an issue with your tier or payout, reach out to support@ndax.io.

You can find the full terms here:
https://ndax.io/en/support/affiliates_and_referrals/affiliate-program-terms-conditions
